name: Ludo Shooter (Anushka madushanka)
description:
Welcome to Ludo Shooter. A wave-based shooter where you have to destroy the board pieces coming to kill you. But every time you reload, the dice will roll and add a random modifier to your game. So try to survive as many waves as you can.

Game made for GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Controls

  • Movement: WASD
  • Look Around: Mouse
  • Shoot: Left Mouse Button
  • Aim: Right Mouse Button
  • Jump: Space
